comments.body: (Maybe add a similar case with `m3 = function() ...` which should error, as a reminder that it's different and in case some rewrites are added in the future?)

diffHunk:

    quanch = this.m3() // should error

comments.body: Given the code change, I don't understand why the lines with `// ok` don't error. It is *nice* that they don't though.
